titleStmt.title: An exposition in the epistell of Iude the apostel of Christ wherein he setteth playnly before euery mans eyes false apostels, and theyr craftes, by ye which they haue longe receyued symple christian people.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Lancelot, d. 1576.

titleStmt.title: An exposition in the epistell of Iude the apostel of Christ wherein he setteth playnly before euery mans eyes false apostels, and theyr craftes, by ye which they haue longe receyued symple christian people.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Lancelot, d. 1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprynted in the house of Thomas Gybson,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 21042a on UMI microfilm reel 1557.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Cambridge University Library.
Appears at reel 142 # 16 (British Library copy), and at reel 1557 #3 (Cambridge University Library copy).
